plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

plugins.name: Random Rectangle Maker
plugins.description:
This plugin was made for testing purposes to test the cursor AI. I used Cursor AI to write the code and ChatGPT to help design the cover and icon. It’s a quick example of how fun and fast building with AI tools can be.


With one click, the plugin adds a rectangle to your canvas. Each rectangle shows up in a random spot with a random bright color.


→ Made with the help of Cursor AI for coding

→ Visuals created with ChatGPT

→ Quick, simple, and fun to use

→ A small tool for creative ideas


I really enjoy working where design and code come together. If you’re building something creative like a design tool, plugin, or even a storytelling project, I’d love to connect.


Reach out anytime: hey@abdulwahab.design

Or connect on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/heyabdulwahab/

accepted.name: Abdul Wahab
accepted.description:
Senior Visual Design Analyst at Accenture Song
— — — 
I blend creativity and technical background to design beautiful efficient interfaces and experiences ◡̈

plugins.tagline: Random rectangles with colorful precision.

plugins.name: Zeytal Variables Extractor
plugins.description:
Zeytal helps developers extract and optimize SVGs, transform Figma styles and variables, and generate TailwindCSS config files effortlessly.


This plugin helps Zeytal users leverage their Figma variables.


Zeytal Features

  1. Extract and optimize SVGs
  2. Extract and convert Figma variables to .ts, .js, .json, .css, .scss, .sass, and .less files
  3. Extract and convert Figma styles to .ts, .js, .json, .css, .scss, .sass, and .less files
  4. Convert Figma styles and variables to TailwindCSS v4 config files.


This Plugin

This plugin helps Figma users prepare their Figma files for Figma variables extraction and code generation.


How it works :

  1. Start the plugin.
  2. Click on one button to export your Figma variables to Zeytal
  3. Use Zeytal CLI to generate your code and config files


Everything is explained in detail in Zeytal documentation.
plugins.tagline: From Figma to Code In One Command Line

133510.name: Zeytal Variables Extractor
133510.description:

  3. Extract and convert Figma styles to .ts, .js, .json, .css, .scss, .sass, and .less files

plugins.name: SVGinify
plugins.description:
Convert SVG's in single files or Symbol Sprite.

This plugin will suit you if you use icons in your project as SVG Sprite using <use> tag.

Automatically cleans SVG from unnecessary attributes.


How to use:

You must select Component Variants with your icons.

Component variants must have the following properties:

  1. name - string
  2. stroke - Off / On


Component Variants must have no errors.
plugins.tagline: Convert SVG's in single files or Symbol Sprite

plugins.name: AI Brand Guide
plugins.description:
AI Brand Guide transforms your design files into comprehensive, professional brand guides in seconds. Extract and organize design elements from your Figma files to create beautiful, developer-friendly documentation.


Key Features

  1. Intelligent Design Element Categorization: Automatically organizes your elements into Buttons, Icons, and Other Elements based on naming patterns
  2. Multi-Frame Export: Choose between Single Frame (all sections in one scrollable frame) or Separate Frames (each section in its own dedicated frame)
  3. Color Palette Extraction: Automatically extracts colors from your selection with detailed RGB, HEX, and HSL values
  4. AI-Powered Color Naming: Generate professional, creative names for your color palette with a single click
  5. Color Theory Generation: Create comprehensive color theory documentation including palette overview, color roles, visual qualities, and usage recommendations
  6. Typography Hierarchy System: Extracts and organizes typography into a structured system with Header and Paragraph classifications
  7. Component Documentation: Displays detailed specifications for buttons, icons and other elements including exact dimensions and padding values
  8. Visual Previews: Generates thumbnail previews for all design elements
  9. Form Element Detection: Special handling for contact forms and other form elements with improved display


How It Works

  1. Select your design elements in Figma (frames, components, or entire pages)
  2. Generate your brand guide with a single click
  3. Customize your guide: Rename colors, add color theory, or organize elements
  4. Export to Figma: Choose your preferred layout style and generate a complete brand guide directly in your Figma file


Element Categorization

For best results, use these naming patterns:

  1. Buttons: Include "btn" or "button" in the name (e.g., "btn-primary", "submit-button")
  2. Icons: Include "icn" or "icon" in the name (e.g., "icn-home", "arrow-icon")
  3. Other Elements: Include "element" or "other" in the name (e.g., "card-element", "other-banner")


What's Included in Your Brand Guide

  1. Color Palette: Complete color documentation with visual swatches and color codes
  2. Typography System: Organized type hierarchy with font details and visual examples
  3. Buttons Collection: All button variants with exact dimensions and padding specifications
  4. Icon Library: Organized icon set with dimensions and specifications
  5. Additional Elements: Cards, banners, forms and other UI components with detailed measurements
  6. Color Theory: Optional section providing insights on palette psychology, symbolism and usage


AI Brand Guide helps design teams maintain consistency while giving developers the exact specifications they need to implement designs accurately.
plugins.tagline: Transform designs into comprehensive brand guides with AI-powered color intelligence.

plugins.name: Flatten Vectors Within
plugins.description:
A simple plugin that flattens all vector shapes (such as rectangles, ellipses, lines, and paths) within each selected frame or group into a single vector layer. Each frame or group is processed individually, so layers aren’t merged throughout. It’s a quick way to clean up icons or illustrations and make overrides easier when turning them into components.


Created with the help of AI.


How to use the plugin

  1. Select one or more frames or groups that contain vector layers.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Each frame or group will now contain a single vector layer named Vector.

accepted.name: Ali Salem
accepted.description: A product designer driven by a sense of responsibility towards enabling and empowering others. Currently building Design Systems at Auth0.

plugins.tagline: Flattens vectors in each selected frame or group into one layer — processed separately.

138430.name: Flatten Vectors Within
138430.description:
A simple plugin that flattens all vector shapes (such as rectangles, ellipses, lines, and paths) within each selected frame or group into a single vector layer. Each frame or group is processed individually, so layers aren’t merged throughout. It’s a quick way to clean up icons or illustrations and make overrides easier when turning them into components.


Created with the help of AI.


How to use the plugin

  1. Select one or more frames or groups that contain vector layers.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Each frame or group will now contain a single vector layer named Vector.
138430.tagline: Flattens vectors in each selected frame or group into one layer — processed separately.

plugins.name: 图表库 Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.name: horses
plugins.description:
How it works


1. Select the layers you wish to populate.

2. Run the plugin.

3. The plugin will populate all valid layers with a horse.


- Selection can include groups. The plugin will recursively collect all image-fill-compatible nodes.

- The plugin fetches images based on layer orientation (landscape, portrait, squarish).
plugins.tagline: Populate your document with majestic horses

plugins.name: 液态玻璃生成器 Liquid Glass Generator
plugins.description:
介绍

Liquid Glass 是一款帮助设计师快速创建液态玻璃风格 UI 效果的 Figma 插件，可模拟现代界面中常见的毛玻璃、层叠光影等质感表现。


功能说明

•一键生成包含背景模糊、渐变描边和透明填充的液态玻璃容器

•支持调节透明度和模糊强度

•自动叠加纹理图层，增强真实感

•创建位置自动居中显示在当前视图中心


使用方法

1.在 Figma 插件菜单中运行 Liquid Glass

2.设置透明度和模糊参数

3.点击 Apply 按钮生成液态玻璃框

4.自动居中展示，可根据需要自由拖动或组合使用


注意事项

•推荐用于浅色或模糊背景下，视觉更佳

•可与其他 UI 元素组合使用增强表现力

•在复杂画布上运行时可能略有延迟


Introduction

Liquid Glass is a Figma plugin for designers who want to create realistic glassmorphism UI effects effortlessly. It simulates the layered, frosted, and glowing look commonly seen in modern interfaces.


Function Description

•Adds a liquid glass style frame with background blur, angular stroke, and gradient fills

•Includes configurable opacity and blur settings

•Adds optional layered texture for enhanced realism

•Automatically centers the effect on your current viewport


How to Use

1.Run the plugin from the Figma plugins menu

2.Adjust opacity and blur in the popup panel

3.Click “Apply” to generate a liquid glass frame

4.The generated element appears centered in your viewport


Notes

•Works best on light or blurred backgrounds

•You can group the frame with existing UI elements

•Performance may vary with complex canvases

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Create beautiful glassmorphism effects instantly

plugins.name: Toko
plugins.description:
Toko – Bridge your Figma “source-of-truth” tokens straight into code


Bring your design system to life without any copy-&-paste errors. With Toko you can:


1. Export any Figma token set

• Colors, typography, spacing, radius, etc.

• Output as:


• CSS variables

• JSON objects

• JavaScript modules

• Tailwind CSS config


2. Generate CSS classes from text styles

• Automatically map your Figma text styles into CSS class names.

• No hand-writing class names—just pick your style library and go.


3. Push updates directly to GitHub

• Connect a repo in a few clicks

• Keep your token files in sync with every Figma change


4. Flexible export options

• Copy to clipboard

• Download ready-to-use files

• Push to your Repo using PAT


---


Why you’ll love Toko


One-click workflow: Stay in Figma—no jumping between apps.

Design–developer alignment: Ship the exact values your designers approved.

Always up-to-date: Version your tokens alongside your code.

Team-ready: Invite collaborators, lock down your design system, and roll out across projects.


Ready to stop manual syncing and start shipping design tokens as code? Install Toko and transform your Figma styles into production-ready assets today!
plugins.tagline: Toko converts Figma design tokens into ready CSS, JSON, JS, or Tailwind code, exporting to GitHub!!!

136792.description: Digche is a pixel-perfect icon plugin designed exclusively for the DIG Design System. With over 1000 customizable icons, Digche helps you build clean, consistent, and scalable interfaces – faster than ever.

plugins.name: Dialekt
plugins.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
plugins.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

136509.name: Dialekt
136509.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
136509.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

136490.name: Layer Query
136490.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
136490.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: 清除/隐藏切片 Clear or Hide Slice
plugins.description:
介绍

清除切片 Clear Slice 是一个高效的图层管理插件，可一键清理选区内的所有 Slice 图层，并提供隐藏/显示控制选项。适用于批量处理切图冗余、整理输出前的画板。


功能说明

  1. 清除选中范围内所有 Slice 图层
  2. 可选是否解除组件实例后再处理
  3. 支持隐藏和显示 Slice 图层
  4. 多操作入口，灵活控制图层状态


使用方法

  1. 选择任意 Frame、Component 或 Instance
  2. 打开插件，勾选是否解除组件实例
  3. 点击所需操作按钮（清除 / 隐藏 / 显示）
  4. 插件将自动处理所有嵌套 Slice 图层


注意事项

  1. 若组件为受保护实例，请先手动解除
  2. 操作不可撤销，建议操作前先保存版本
  3. 插件默认递归处理所有子图层


Introduction

Clear Slice is a lightweight utility plugin that helps you remove, hide, or show all Slice layers within selected elements—ideal for cleaning up export slices before delivery.


Function Description

  1. Remove all Slice layers in the selection
  2. Optional: auto-detach instance before processing
  3. Hide or show Slice layers instead of deleting
  4. Simple UI with precise layer control options


How to Use

  1. Select any Frame, Component, or Instance
  2. Open the plugin and toggle "Detach instance" as needed
  3. Click your desired action: Clear / Hide / Show
  4. The plugin processes all nested slices recursively


Notes

  1. Protected components may require manual detaching
  2. Changes are not reversible — save your work before use
  3. The plugin processes all child layers in depth

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Clean up slice layers with one click and full control

plugins.name: Textos para Cards
plugins.description:
Textos para Cards é um plugin que aplica automaticamente seus blocos de texto nos cards correspondentes no Figma, usando nomes como texto 1 -, texto 2 -, etc.

Ideal para carrosséis, infográficos e conteúdos de redes sociais.

Basta colar o texto e deixar o plugin fazer o trabalho repetitivo por você.
plugins.tagline: Transforme texto em design, em segundos.

plugins.name: 📝 Text Export / Import (JSON)
plugins.description: Easily export all text layers from your Figma designs into a clean JSON format — and import them back just as smoothly. Export from selected frames or the entire document, with options to include or skip locked layers. Perfect for localization, content updates, or developer handoff.
plugins.tagline: Text to JSON. JSON to Text. Simple.

136667.name: 📝 Text Export / Import (JSON)
136667.description: Easily export all text layers from your Figma designs into a clean JSON format — and import them back just as smoothly. Export from selected frames or the entire document, with options to include or skip locked layers. Perfect for localization, content updates, or developer handoff.
136667.release_notes:
UI Update:
The plugin interface is now cleaner and more user-friendly: instructions and selection info are clearly aligned and spaced, all main blocks have equal margins, and paddings are unified for a balanced look. The selection block stands out with a soft background and rounded corners, making export/import actions more intuitive and visually appealing.
136667.tagline: Text to JSON. JSON to Text. Simple.

plugins.tagline: Bulk annotate instantly!

plugins.name: SAR - Search and Replace
plugins.description:
**SAR (Search and Replace)** is a simple and efficient Figma plugin that helps you rename layers in bulk.


Select any frame or run across the entire page to:

- 🔍 Search for any text in layer names

- ✏️ Replace it with new content

- 🧠 Choose case-sensitive or global replacement


Perfect for cleaning up messy file structures, renaming layers by version or type, and maintaining naming consistency across your design system.


No more manual renaming. Just SAR it. 🚀
plugins.tagline: Quickly search and replace text in layer names – all at once.
